definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: The word Qita in the Korean language means China, which is a sound translation of Khitan, an ancient nationality in China.
sentences.chinese: 乞大是契丹的另一種音譯，在這裏指稱中國。

sentences.english: At last, it point out the correlation between the Kripke"semantics and his reference theory."
sentences.chinese: 最後指出了克里普克語義學與其指稱理論的關聯。

sentences.english: The NRSV does not change masculine pronouns referring to God, however.
sentences.chinese: 在NRSV沒有改變男性化的代名詞，來指稱上帝。

sentences.english: In both cases the women accused of posting the profiles denied it.
sentences.chinese: 兩個案子中，被指稱發帖的女性都矢口否認。
他們列舉了他的被指稱的罪狀。

sentences.english: The emphasis is given to the denotational description of code generation languages.
sentences.chinese: 本文側重討論了代碼生成語言的指稱描述。

sentences.english: Now, recent allegations made by Lumumba have provoked a backlash in Kenya's parliament.
sentences.chinese: 盧蒙巴最近提出的指稱在肯尼亞議會激起了反彈。

sentences.english: She urged Kabul to stop making such claims.
sentences.chinese: 揚尤亞敦促喀布爾不要再提出這種指稱。

sentences.english: The internal word order of designating forms follows the rule of priority of attribute-core.
sentences.chinese: 指稱形式的內部語序，遵循定中優先的原則。

sentences.english: One must also develop a denotational semantics for function abstraction and application.
sentences.chinese: 還必須開發函數抽象和應用的指稱語義。

sentences.english: IV. Properly address investigation of alleged use of biological weapons.
sentences.chinese: 第四，妥善處理調查指稱使用生物武器問題。

sentences.english: Semantically, reference is manifested in lexical meaning as well as truth-value of sentences.
sentences.chinese: 從語義上看，指稱體現在詞彙意義和句子的真值上。

sentences.english: I am going, by God, to try to indicate to you the final reference points in as simple a way as I can.
sentences.chinese: 我將盡可能簡單扼要地跟你們指出最後的幾點指稱。

sentences.english: South Korean authorities have been careful to avoid explicitly labeling the release as a "water attack."
sentences.chinese: 韓國謹慎，一直指稱開閘放水事件是一次“水攻”。

sentences.english: Asiri is alleged to have recruited his brother into al-Qaeda and into the plot.
sentences.chinese: Asiri被指稱招募基地組織和他的弟弟到情節。

sentences.english: The referents of anaphora mentally exist.
sentences.chinese: 照應詞的指稱對象是一個心理存在。

definition: to declare to be untrue/to deny
to report a case to the authorities
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to call oneself/to claim to be/to profess/to claim a title
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
